name: MuMiPlux
short_description:
Operating system 64-bit kernel 3.13.0-24 generic, full of multimedia codecs already installed, in order to take maximum advantage of web content already after installing the DVD, with as many as 174 applications already installed and ready to start to produce right away. The operating system that I presented on this website is entirely based on Linux Ubuntu 14:04 LTS. To download it entirely just follow this direct link to: http://tinyurl.com/l4cdb3z.
 In any event, please visit my website and search www.Michinlab.com MuMiPlux, you will have a guide on how and what to do to use it. To facilitate the task of those who wish to download MuMiPlux strongly recommend you to use a Manager Downloader, also saw the size of the file Iso.Ha many useful features, in particular the Piò is used in live from usb stick and take it with you regardless of Pc that home to just start from the USB boot.
